# Changelog
### 1.0.0 (2015-10-19)
* Updated to `lesshint` `1.0`.
* Errors are no longer emitted to the stream.
* The `errors` property on each file in the stream are now called `results`.
* Moved logging to its own reporter.

## 0.4.0 (2015-08-31)
* Updated `lesshint` to `0.9.0`.

## 0.3.0 (2015-08-16)
* Updated `lesshint` to `0.8.0`.
* Updated other dependencies.
* More tests.

## 0.2.0 (2015-06-26)
* Updated `lesshint` to stable `0.7.0`.

## 0.1.1 (2015-06-24)
* `gulp-lesshint` has a new home: https://github.com/lesshint/gulp-lesshint

## 0.1.0 (2015-06-11)
* Initial release
